Posts.Content: You may want to check outhttp://nettystrio.tumblr.com/.  This is a story of a friend with triple negative BC who went to China for treatment.  I also went to China for treatment for stage IV ER/PR+, HER2+ with bone mets.  My web iswww.triciaspence.comwhi ch provides some details regarding the treatment provided by Dr. Wang.  He is doing very advanced, out of the box treatment and has been very successful with breast cancer patients.  It does not hurt to have your sister send her details to Dr. Wang for his opinion.  You will find the contact information on my website.  All the best to you and your sister.  In peace, Tricia Spence
Posts.Title: Triple Negative Breast Cancer (Need help/info)

Posts.Content: not sure why the words merged on to the web site links once I posted this, but here are the correct links:   http://nettystrio.tumblr.com   www.triciaspence.com
